column1: # The 1890s sheet provides a few monthly values for 1889 in the comments section: these have been ignored.
# The figures presented for 1900 are from Wigganthorpe Hall and have been omitted.
# For 1907 and 1908 the gauge was at the college rather than the abbey.
# The 1910 total has been increased by 0.03 compared to the sheet figure to match the sum of the months.
# The gauge was changed from an 8" gauge to a 5" gauge in 1925.
# The detailed location of this site at Ampleforth is not clear. The grid reference is indicative.
# Readings from this Ampleforth gauge/site ended in 1930. Readings continued from a different site at Ampleforth using station number 3457.
